titleStmt.title: A curious collection of paintings, by the best masters, extraordinary fine. A large iron cash chest, and several other curiosities. Will be sold by auction, on Thursday, Friday and Saturday the 17th. 18th. and 19th. of this instant March, 1691/92.. [sic] at four of the clock afternoon, in the Outropers-Office in the west-end of the Royal Exchange The conditions of sale. ... Catalogues whereof are to be had at the said office.

A curious collection of paintings, by the best masters, extraordinary fine. A large iron cash chest, and several other curiosities. Will be sold by auction, on Thursday, Friday and Saturday the 17th. 18th. and 19th. of this instant March, 1691/92.. [sic] at four of the clock afternoon, in the Outropers-Office in the west-end of the Royal Exchange The conditions of sale. ... Catalogues whereof are to be had at the said office.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
